001
002/**
003 * Classe GameWorld - Créer le monde du jeu
004 * 
005 * Création des pièces, items, trapdoor, lockdoor
006 *
007 * @author CLEMENT RUAN
008 * @version 2026
009 */
010public class GameWorld
011{
012    /**
013     * Constructeur privé - empêche l'instanciation
014     */
015    private GameWorld(){}
016    
017    /**
018     * Construit le monde du jeu
019     * Retourne la pièce de départ
020     * 
021     * @return La pièce de départ
022     */
023    public static Room createWorld()
024    {
025        // Les pièces du bateau
026        Room vBoat = new Room("in the boat", "images/boat/boat.jpg");
027        Room vDeck = new Room("on the deck", "images/boat/deck.jpg");
028        Room vGalley = new Room("in the galley", "images/boat/galley.jpg");
029        Room vCockpit = new Room("in the cockpit", "images/boat/cockpit.jpg");
030        Room vCabin = new Room("in the cabin", "images/boat/cabin.jpg");
031        Room vCabinFloor1 = new Room("in the first floor of the cabin", "images/boat/cabin_floor_1.jpg");
032        // Trap Doors
033        Room vSlide = new Room("in the slide (trapdoor), you can't go up !", "");
034        Room vEmergencyExit = new Room("in an emergency path (trapdoor)", "");
035
036        // Le placement des pièces
037        // Boat
038        vBoat.setExit("deck", vDeck);
039        vBoat.setExit("cockpit", vCockpit);
040        vBoat.setExit("galley", vGalley);
041        // Deck
042        vDeck.setExit("boat", vBoat);
043        // Galley
044        vGalley.setExit("boat", vBoat);
045        // Cockpit
046        vCockpit.setExit("boat", vBoat);
047        vCockpit.setExit("cabin", vCabin);
048        vCockpit.setExit("emergency", vEmergencyExit);
049        // Cabin
050        vCabin.setExit("cockpit", vCockpit);
051        vCabin.setExit("floor1", vCabinFloor1);
052        // Cabin - etage1
053        vCabinFloor1.setExit("cabin", vCabin);
054        vCabinFloor1.setExit("slide", vSlide);
055        // Slide
056        vSlide.setExit("down", vCabin);
057        // Emergency Exit
058        vEmergencyExit.setExit("exit", vBoat);
059        
060        // Créer les items
061        Item vKeyCabin = new Item("key_cabin", "This key can unlock the cabin", 0.1, 10);
062        Item vBed = new Item("bed", "A comfortable bed", 100, 500);
063        Item vBooks = new Item("book", "Captain's book", 0.5, 15);
064        Item vChair1 = new Item("chair1", "A chair", 4, 20);
065        Item vChair2 = new Item("chair2", "A chair", 4.5, 25);
066        Item vChair3 = new Item("chair3", "A chair", 9, 45);
067        Item vCoin = new Item("coin", "3 Jerries", 0.1, 3);
068        Item vCookie = new Item("cookie", 
069                               "A magic cookie that increases your strength", 0.1, 5);
070        Beamer vBeamer = new Beamer();
071        
072        // Ajouter les items aux pièces
073        vBoat.setItem(vCoin);
074        vBoat.setItem(vCookie);
075        vBoat.setItem(vKeyCabin);
076        
077        vDeck.setItem(vBeamer);
078        
079        vGalley.setItem(vChair3);
080        vGalley.setItem(vChair2);
081        vGalley.setItem(vChair1);
082        
083        vCabin.setItem(vBooks);
084        
085        vCabinFloor1.setItem(vBed);
086        
087        // Les portes
088        Door vDoorCockpitCabin = new Door(vKeyCabin, false);
089        vCockpit.setDoor("cabin", vDoorCockpitCabin);
090        vCabin.setDoor("cockpit", vDoorCockpitCabin);
091        
092        // Pièce de départ
093        return vBoat; 
094    } // CreateWorld()
095} // GameWorld()
